analysis: The documents all pertain to the establishment, continuation, or modification of Presidential advisory committees or commissions. These committees cover a wide range of topics, including nutrition, school finance, crime victims, arts and humanities, military compensation, law enforcement, personnel interchange, mediation and conciliation, and trade/investment in Africa. A common element is the use of experts and advisors from outside the government to provide guidance and recommendations to the President and relevant government agencies.
title: Presidential Advisory Groups on Diverse Policy Areas
